Graph (Graf) Nedir? â€‹

Graph, LangGraph'ta node'larÄ± ve aralarÄ±ndaki baÄŸlantÄ±larÄ± (edge) bir araya getiren yapÄ±dÄ±r. StateGraph sÄ±nÄ±fÄ± ile tanÄ±mlanÄ±r.

Graf OluÅŸturma AdÄ±mlarÄ± â€‹

python
from langgraph.graph import StateGraph, END
from .core.state import AgentState

# 1. Graf oluÅŸtur
workflow = StateGraph(AgentState)

# 2. Node'larÄ± ekle
workflow.add_node("main_agent", main_router_agent)
workflow.add_node("math_expert", math_expert_node)
workflow.add_node("legal_expert", legal_expert_node)
workflow.add_node("greeting_expert", greeting_node)

# 3. BaÅŸlangÄ±Ã§ noktasÄ±nÄ± belirle
workflow.set_entry_point("main_agent")

# 4. KenarlarÄ± ekle
workflow.add_conditional_edges(
    "main_agent",
    route_decision,
    {
        "math": "math_expert",
        "legal": "legal_expert",
        "greeting": "greeting_expert",
    }
)

workflow.add_edge("math_expert", END)
workflow.add_edge("legal_expert", END)
workflow.add_edge("greeting_expert", END)

# 5. Derle
app = workflow.compile()

Edge TÃ¼rleri â€‹

1. DÃ¼z Kenar (Normal Edge) â€‹

A dÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼mÃ¼nden B dÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼mÃ¼ne her zaman gider:

python
workflow.add_edge("math_expert", END)

2. KoÅŸullu Kenar (Conditional Edge) â€‹

Bir fonksiyonun dÃ¶ndÃ¼rdÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼ deÄŸere gÃ¶re farklÄ± dÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼mlere gider:

python
def route_decision(state: AgentState) -> str:
    return state["intent"]  # "math", "legal", "greeting"...

workflow.add_conditional_edges(
    "main_agent",          # Hangi node'dan sonra karar verilecek
    route_decision,        # Karar fonksiyonu
    {                      # Mapping: dÃ¶nen deÄŸer â†’ hedef node
        "math": "math_expert",
        "legal": "legal_expert",
        "greeting": "greeting_expert",
    }
)

3. END â€‹

GrafÄ±n bitiÅŸ noktasÄ±. END sabitiyle gÃ¶sterilir:

python
from langgraph.graph import END

workflow.add_edge("greeting_expert", END)

Projenizin Graf YapÄ±sÄ± â€‹

python
# run.py â€” Tam graf tanÄ±mÄ±
from langgraph.graph import StateGraph, END
from typing import Literal

def route_decision(state: AgentState) -> Literal["math", "legal", "greeting", "vektor"]:
    return state["intent"]

workflow = StateGraph(AgentState)

# Node'lar
workflow.add_node("main_agent", main_router_agent)
workflow.add_node("it_legal_expert", it_legal_rag_node)
workflow.add_node("math_expert", math_expert_node)
workflow.add_node("legal_expert", legal_expert_node)
workflow.add_node("greeting_expert", greeting_node)
workflow.add_node("vektor_rag_expert", vektor_rag_node)
workflow.add_node("support_rag_expert", support_rag_node)

# GiriÅŸ
workflow.set_entry_point("main_agent")

# YÃ¶nlendirme
workflow.add_conditional_edges(
    "main_agent",
    route_decision,
    {
        "math": "math_expert",
        "it_legal": "it_legal_expert",
        "legal": "legal_expert",
        "greeting": "greeting_expert",
        "vektor": "vektor_rag_expert",
        "support": "support_rag_expert"
    }
)

# BitiÅŸ kenarlarÄ±
workflow.add_edge("it_legal_expert", END)
workflow.add_edge("math_expert", END)
workflow.add_edge("legal_expert", END)
workflow.add_edge("greeting_expert", END)
workflow.add_edge("vektor_rag_expert", END)
workflow.add_edge("support_rag_expert", END)

app = workflow.compile()

Graf GÃ¶rselleÅŸtirme â€‹

LangGraph, grafÄ± Mermaid diyagramÄ± olarak export edebilir:

python
# Graf'Ä±n Mermaid gÃ¶rselini al
print(app.get_graph().draw_mermaid())

Ã‡Ä±ktÄ±:

%%{init: {'flowchart': {'curve': 'linear'}}}%%
flowchart TD
    __start__ --> main_agent
    main_agent -. math .-> math_expert
    main_agent -. legal .-> legal_expert
    main_agent -. greeting .-> greeting_expert
    math_expert --> __end__
    legal_expert --> __end__
    greeting_expert --> __end__

Compile ile Son AdÄ±m â€‹

python
app = workflow.compile()

compile() grafÄ± Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±labilir hale getirir. Bu adÄ±mdan sonra app.invoke() ile Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rabilirsin.

Opsiyonel: checkpointer ekleyerek konuÅŸma geÃ§miÅŸini kaydedebilirsin:

python
from langgraph.checkpoint.memory import MemorySaver

checkpointer = MemorySaver()
app = workflow.compile(checkpointer=checkpointer)
